com.martinkl.warc.mapred

Class WARCOutputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapred.FileOutputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable,WARCWritable>
      • com.martinkl.warc.mapred.WARCOutputFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.mapred.OutputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable,WARCWritable>

    public class WARCOutputFormat
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapred.FileOutputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable,WARCWritable>

    Hadoop OutputFormat for mapred jobs (‘old’ API) that want to write data to WARC files.

    Usage:

    JobConf job = new JobConf(getConf());
job.setOutputFormat(WARCOutputFormat.class);
job.setOutputKeyClass(NullWritable.class);
job.setOutputValueClass(WARCWritable.class);
FileOutputFormat.setCompressOutput(job, true);

    The tasks generating the output (usually the reducers, but may be the mappers if there are no reducers) should use NullWritable.get() as the output key, and the WARCWritable as the output value.
